name: infinite_folders
title: Infinite Folders
description: Allows infinite recursion depth in folders instead of a maximum depth of 2 folders. Also allows unassigned and multi-level folders for the Journal. *WARNING*: Any folder more than 2 levels deep and all of its contents may become lost if this module becomes permanently unusable in a future FVTT update, please read the README file for the full DISCLAIMER.
author: KaKaRoTo
